channel.title: Server run vps help
channel.description:
hey need help. i run server on my computer is good work. put to vps run server error.. who can help?
my run.bat file:
@echo off title aaaa test server :loop java -Xmx1024m -cp bin;deps/netty-3.2.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
[1/29/12 4:56 PM]: Initilizing tala... [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/jboss/netty/util/Timer [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:104) [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.jboss.netty.util.Timer [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) [1/29/12 4:56 PM]: ... 1 more

item.title: Server run vps help
item.dc:creator: @imperica-pvp imperica-pvp
item.description:
@imperica-pvp wrote:

Which base is it?

Mine is:

@echo off title Project Insanity :starting java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server goto starting

Try, updating your JAVA.

Read full topic

item.title: Server run vps help
item.dc:creator: @infernalpkk infernalpkk
item.description:
@infernalpkk wrote:

hey need help. i run server on my computer is good work. put to vps run server error… who can help?

my run.bat file:

@echo off
title aaaa test server
:loop
java -Xmx1024m -cp bin;deps/netty-3.2.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

[1/29/12 4:56 PM]: Initilizing tala…
